attributes.additional_details: all of the undersigned carers in this country save the government on average of £582.00 each per week for each person that we care for and you pay us an allowance of £ 59 a week even with other benefits added on it doesnt account to a respectable living wage and we work hard looking after our disabled relatives. carers that work for a company get between £ 10 to £ 15 an hour we get less than £ 9 a day and we are 24 hour a day carers this seriously needs addressing
